name: Considerations in appointing teachers
text:
In the appointment of teachers by the department, preference shall be given to local teachers of the same standing, grade, or rating as those teachers from without the State.  The rating of a teacher shall not depend upon the number of pupils promoted or graduated, but solely upon the length of service, efficiency, and ability of the teacher. [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2]
